entry.data:
CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO NORTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
